title: Order of the Lotus Janna Concept

embed.description: Been super excited to work on and finish this piece! Had so much fun with the idea. Order of the Lotus Janna concept (League of Legends) -- Paint Tool S... Order of the Lotus Janna Concept

body:
This idea was suggested to me by a friend! I ended up having so much fun with it that I fully colored and shaded it. I personally don't like any of the Janna skins terribly much, so I think this one would suit her very well. Let me know what you think!

Other art: http://kairui-chan.deviantart.com/
More concepts: [Sweetheart Nami](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/eXtqHMfd-sweetheart-nami-concept), [Pool Party Janna](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/t0Mfo7f8-pool-party-janna), [Shamrock Jinx](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/b1tZ0o4y-shamrock-jinx-concept-sketch)

replies.body:
Sorry no can do. She's way too covered up d:^)

Jokes aside, it looks really good
{{champion:157}} _Hasgi intensifies_

If that skin gets ever release Yasuo x Janna will be my favorite ship xD
Yasuo x Riven tho
That's the canon one :P I hope Riot develops it a bit.
their enemies, yas thinks she killed his fucking master.
Janna is one of my favourite supports, and I love this. It's very beautiful. Great job!
what do u ship aurelion sol with?
A really big box
Soraka?
wrong. SHYVANNA......SO OBVIOUS, JEZZ,.
Thank you so much! :D
Looks like you really hit the Order of the Lotus style on the head.  Would be cool seeing this concept in game!  Really clean! Well done :)
Thank you so much! I would love to see an in-game concept as well, so maybe that's something I'll work on in the future. :D

Well is it gonna get released then? :O
Sorry for macrobumping but I love janna and I love this skin, I already have three skins of her but I would buy this in a heartbeat

Looks pretty neat.

But isn't Order of the Lotus skins for Ionian champions?

I think they have only done them for Ionian champions so far, but I am _really_ hoping they would make exceptions! Like MrBuffinton said, they usually put the lore aside for skin purposes. All we can do is upvote and hope!

Hopefully they do.
{{champion:40}} looks so damn good in pink and she doesn't have any Valentine day skin either.
Wow this looks so good!! Janna really needs this skin cuze all her others are really bad... Plz riot... Good drawing!
Victorious and Forecast are bad?
Insta-buy! Very beautiful design and vibrant colors! I can imagine her Q and ult having tons of lotus/cherry blossom leafs blowing around.
This is a great skin! I wish Riot would make it.
This would be the elegant skin that Janna needs rly bad <3
Hey! Looks amazing !
OMG SO MUCH YES!!!! there could be such cool animations with this too!!

WHY DOESN'T MY WALLET GO THROUGH THE SCREEN?!

But honestly.

Unless they're going to retcon Janna to be from Ionia, might not happen, as it seems to be an Ionian skin line. But I will buy this in a heartbeat if it does happen.
this looks pretty good.  RIOT HIRE THIS PERSON
This looks absolutely incredible.
I would start playing Janna if this was a thing.

I like the Order of the Lotus line in general and run it almost all the time on Irelia despite having her Aviator and Frostblade. I'm sure I'd feel the same way about Janna despite having her Hextech and Forecast skins.
